sentences: Hideaki Ishi (石 英明, Ishi Hideaki, born July 29, 1962), better known by his stage name DJ Krush, is a record producer and DJ.
Ishi was born in Tokyo in 1962.
He dropped out of school at an early age and joined a local gang and, a few years later, the yakuza.
Ishi was inspired to start DJing after seeing the film Wild Style in 1983.
"When I discovered the film Wild Style in 1983 I found what I really wanted to do, to express myself," he said in a 2015 interview.
Aside from being considered one of the pioneers of Japanese hip hop, Ishi has established himself as one of the most respected artists and producers in the hip hop industry, both in Japan and abroad.
